title: Deep Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: TPACK Competencies for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers in Multidisciplinary Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design a 3-phase lesson plan (introduction-development-conclusion) reflecting all TPACK components (PK: mathematical concept explanation, TK: graphing tool utilization, CK: curriculum standards) within a week, based on an actual math class scenario (e.g., function graph analysis), and submit a lesson plan meeting 4 or more (80%+) of the 5 peer evaluation rubric criteria
Learners improve mathematics teaching methods by utilizing interdisciplinary technology integration strategies in mobile microlearning environments
Learners analyze the effectiveness of TPACK-based lesson designs through peer assessment and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
